title: What is the Madrid tennis schedule?
description: The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open continues on Thursday, when Kei Nishikori and Joao Fonseca headline play on Manolo Santana Stadium. On Arantxa Sanchez Stadium, #NextGenATP Spaniard Martin Landaluce faces Cameron Norrie. View the full Day 2 schedule below. ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 24 APRIL 2025 Manolo Santana Stadium - start 11:00 AM ATP - Aleksandar Vukic (AUS) vs Kei Nishikori (JPN) Not Before 1:00 PM WTA - [7] Mirra Andreeva vs Marie Bouzkova (CZE) WTA - Alexandra Eala (PHI) vs [2] Iga Swiatek (POL) ATP - Joao Fonseca (BRA) vs [Q] Elmer Moller (DEN) Not Before 7:00 PM WTA - Dayana Yastremska (UKR) vs [4] Coco Gauff (USA) Arantxa Sanchez Stadium - start 11:00 AM WTA - Belinda Bencic (SUI) vs [20] Clara Tauson (DEN) ATP - Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) vs Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB) ATP - [WC] Martin Landaluce (ESP) vs Cameron Norrie (GBR) Not Before 5:00 PM WTA - [5] Madison Keys (USA) vs Lucia Bronzetti (ITA) ATP - Reilly Opelka (USA) vs [LL] Rinky Hijikata (AUS) Stadium 3 - start 11:00 AM WTA - Jessica Bouzas Maneiro (ESP) vs [27] Magdalena Frech (POL) WTA - Maya Joint (AUS) vs [11] Emma Navarro (USA) ATP - [LL] Botic van de Zandschulp (NED) vs Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) ATP - Learner Tien (USA) vs Marcos Giron (USA) ATP - Yunchaokete Bu (CHN) vs [Q] Jacob Fearnley (GBR) Court 4 - start 11:00 AM ATP - David Goffin (BEL) vs Alexandre Muller (FRA) ATP - Zizou Bergs (BEL) vs Yoshihito Nishioka (JPN) WTA - [13] Diana Shnaider vs Katie Volynets (USA) WTA - Anastasija Sevastova (LAT) vs [23] Jelena Ostapenko (LAT) WTA - [25] Leylah Fernandez (CAN) vs Ann Li (USA) Court 5 - start 11:00 AM WTA - [19] Donna Vekic (CRO) vs Hailey Baptiste (USA) WTA - [16] Beatriz Haddad Maia (BRA) vs Bernarda Pera (USA) WTA - [31] Linda Noskova (CZE) vs Maria Lourdes Carle (ARG) Not Before 4:00 PM WTA - Yuliia Starodubtseva (UKR) vs [12] Karolina Muchova (CZE) Court 6 - start 11:00 AM ATP - Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) vs Hamad Medjedovic (SRB) ATP - [Q] Daniel Altmaier (GER) vs Nicolas Jarry (CHI) ATP - Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) vs [Q] Borna Coric (CRO) ATP - Tallon Griekspoor (NED) vs [Q] Vit Kopriva (CZE) Court 7 - start 11:00 AM WTA - [18] Liudmila Samsonova vs Caroline Dolehide (USA) WTA - Diane Parry (FRA) vs [30] Anna Kalinskaya WTA - [7] Asia Muhammad (USA) / Demi Schuurs (NED) vs Victoria Azarenka / Ashlyn Krueger (USA) WTA - Veronika Kudermetova / Elise Mertens (BEL) vs Miyu Kato (JPN) / Aldila Sutjiadi (INA) Court 8 - start 11:00 AM ATP - Damir Dzumhur (BIH) vs Mattia Bellucci (ITA) ATP - Quentin Halys (FRA) vs Luciano Darderi (ITA) WTA - Ekaterina Alexandrova / Peyton Stearns (USA) vs Anna Blinkova / Fang-Hsien Wu (TPE) WTA - Nadiia Kichenok (UKR) / Yifan Xu (CHN) vs Alexandra Panova / Fanny Stollar (HUN) [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Read more about the Day 2 schedule for the ATP Masters 1000 event in Madrid, where Joao Fonseca headlines the action.
text: Madrid Fonseca, Nishikori play Thursday April 23, 2025 Getty Images The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open will be held from 23 April-4 May. html:
Madrid

Fonseca, Nishikori play Thursday

April 23, 2025

Getty Images

The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open will be held from 23 April-4 May. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open continues on Thursday, when Kei Nishikori and Joao Fonseca headline play on Manolo Santana Stadium. On Arantxa Sanchez Stadium, #NextGenATP Spaniard Martin Landaluce faces Cameron Norrie. View the full Day 2 schedule below.

ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 24 APRIL 2025
Manolo Santana Stadium - start 11:00 AM
ATP - Aleksandar Vukic (AUS) vs Kei Nishikori (JPN)

Not Before 1:00 PM
WTA - [7] Mirra Andreeva vs Marie Bouzkova (CZE)
WTA - Alexandra Eala (PHI) vs [2] Iga Swiatek (POL)
ATP - Joao Fonseca (BRA) vs [Q] Elmer Moller (DEN)

Not Before 7:00 PM
WTA - Dayana Yastremska (UKR) vs [4] Coco Gauff (USA)

Arantxa Sanchez Stadium - start 11:00 AM
WTA - Belinda Bencic (SUI) vs [20] Clara Tauson (DEN)
ATP - Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) vs Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB)
ATP - [WC] Martin Landaluce (ESP) vs Cameron Norrie (GBR)

Not Before 5:00 PM
WTA - [5] Madison Keys (USA) vs Lucia Bronzetti (ITA)
ATP - Reilly Opelka (USA) vs [LL] Rinky Hijikata (AUS)

Stadium 3 - start 11:00 AM
WTA - Jessica Bouzas Maneiro (ESP) vs [27] Magdalena Frech (POL)
WTA - Maya Joint (AUS) vs [11] Emma Navarro (USA)
ATP - [LL] Botic van de Zandschulp (NED) vs Jan-Lennard Struff (GER)
ATP - Learner Tien (USA) vs Marcos Giron (USA)
ATP - Yunchaokete Bu (CHN) vs [Q] Jacob Fearnley (GBR)

Court 4 - start 11:00 AM
ATP - David Goffin (BEL) vs Alexandre Muller (FRA)
ATP - Zizou Bergs (BEL) vs Yoshihito Nishioka (JPN)
WTA - [13] Diana Shnaider vs Katie Volynets (USA)
WTA - Anastasija Sevastova (LAT) vs [23] Jelena Ostapenko (LAT)
WTA - [25] Leylah Fernandez (CAN) vs Ann Li (USA)

Court 5 - start 11:00 AM WTA -
[19] Donna Vekic (CRO) vs Hailey Baptiste (USA)
WTA - [16] Beatriz Haddad Maia (BRA) vs Bernarda Pera (USA)
WTA - [31] Linda Noskova (CZE) vs Maria Lourdes Carle (ARG)

Not Before 4:00 PM
WTA - Yuliia Starodubtseva (UKR) vs [12] Karolina Muchova (CZE)

Court 6 - start 11:00 AM
ATP - Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) vs Hamad Medjedovic (SRB)
ATP - [Q] Daniel Altmaier (GER) vs Nicolas Jarry (CHI)
ATP - Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) vs [Q] Borna Coric (CRO)
ATP - Tallon Griekspoor (NED) vs [Q] Vit Kopriva (CZE)

Court 7 - start 11:00 AM
WTA - [18] Liudmila Samsonova vs Caroline Dolehide (USA)
WTA - Diane Parry (FRA) vs [30] Anna Kalinskaya
WTA - [7] Asia Muhammad (USA) / Demi Schuurs (NED) vs Victoria Azarenka / Ashlyn Krueger (USA)
WTA - Veronika Kudermetova / Elise Mertens (BEL) vs Miyu Kato (JPN) / Aldila Sutjiadi (INA)

Court 8 - start 11:00 AM
ATP - Damir Dzumhur (BIH) vs Mattia Bellucci (ITA)
ATP - Quentin Halys (FRA) vs Luciano Darderi (ITA)
WTA - Ekaterina Alexandrova / Peyton Stearns (USA) vs Anna Blinkova / Fang-Hsien Wu (TPE)
WTA - Nadiia Kichenok (UKR) / Yifan Xu (CHN) vs Alexandra Panova / Fanny Stollar (HUN)
